column3: viewers to miss golf major Aug 9 More than 3 million Time Warner Cable  customers in New York
column4: Los Angeles and Dallas will be blocked from watching golf's Major Championship and other popular shows this weekend if the cable company fails to reach an agreement with CBS to end the week-long blackout.

column2: Harbinger sues Deere and GPS companies for $1.9 bln in damagesHarbinger sues Deere and GPS companies for $1.9 billion in damages NEW YORK Philip Falcone's Harbinger Capital on Friday sued agricultural equipment maker Deere & Co and Global Positioning System companies and groups for damages of $1.9 billion as it looks to recoup its investment in bankrupt wireless company LightSquared.  Harbinger sues Deere and GPS companies for $1.9 billion in damages NEW YORK Philip Falcone's Harbinger Capital on Friday sued agricultural equipment maker Deere & Co and Global Positioning System companies and groups for damages of $1.9 billion as it looks to recoup its investment in bankrupt wireless company LightSquared. NEW YORK
column3: Aug 9 Phil Falcone's Harbinger Capital has sued tractor maker Deere & Co and companies in the Global Positioning System industry for damages of $1.9 billion as it hopes to recoup its investment in bankrupt wireless company LightSquared
column4: court papers show.Harbinger sues Deere and GPS companies for $1.9 billion in damages NEW YORK Philip Falcone's Harbinger Capital on Friday sued agricultural equipment maker Deere & Co and Global Positioning System companies and groups for damages of $1.9 billion as it looks to recoup its investment in bankrupt wireless company LightSquared.
